page.description: Get options (A-accepting L-Linger K-Keep Alive R-Reuse Address N-Don't route D-elay X-Debug - I=input buffer O=output buffer T=timeout - '' escapes characters ).
page.discussion: The .OPTIONS_GET() method retrieves a list of the status of each of the options that a socket supports.
page.example: x = s.options_get(<<%str% 'listening'=A 'linger'=L 'keep alive'=K 'Reuse address'=R 'Dont Route'=N 'Delay'=D 'Debug'=X 'input buffer'=I 'output buffer'=O 'timeout'=T %str%) ? x = listening=F linger=F keep alive=F Reuse address=F Dont Route=F Delay=F Debug=F input buffer=8192 output buffer=8192 timeout=-1
